passwordMinLength: The password must be at least {constraints.0} characters long
firstNameAlphaCharacters: First name must only contain letters, spaces, or hyphens
passwordLength: Password must be between {constraints.0} and {constraints.1} characters long
learningLevel: Learning level must be one of A1, A2, B1, B2, C1, C2, or Native
gender: Gender must be either male or female
role: Role must be one of student, admin, or super_admin
